Constructor for initializing an error message indicating no functions were provided.

<Note>
  `NoFunctionsProvidedError` extends `PermissionBuilderError`, see the docs for
  PermissionBuilderError for all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { NoFunctionsProvidedError } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```

## Parameters

### permission

`Permission`
The permission missing functions
